attributes.action: MP's should face disciplinary procedure for making offensive remarks.
attributes.additional_details: It is highly offensive to the Muslim communities to hear insults like these.  These are indeed insults and appear to be going unpunished as of now.  This petition is not only about Boris Johnson, but any MP making insulting comments about the very people they are supposed to be representing
attributes.background: Any MP or person representing a political party should face disciplinary action and be suspended whilst being investigated for insulting comments such as those made by Boris Johnson about Burkha letterbox. These offensive comments were made about the very people he was supposed to be representing.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the political party concerned and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
